Evaluate.Description: Go beyond basic cleansing. Beyond basic cleaning, there's Olay Daily Facials Cleansing Cloths - Hydrating For Normal to Dry Skin. These specially textured, hydrating, soap-free cloths combine lathering cleansers and conditioners to: remove dirt, oil and makeup - even mascara, gently exfoliate and smooth skin's texture, condition skin with exclusive Olay moisture.  Use Daily Facials Lathering Cleansing Cloths in place of your normal cleansing routine, including bars, makeup remover, face wash, cleansing milk and toner.

The Stabila 10-Inch Magnetic Torpedo Level with Protractor Vial is a rugged box-construction torpedo level with full a length magnetic strip built-into the reading surface. The level comes with a box level accuracy of 0.057-degrees featured in two on-board crystal clear, non-fogging, unbreakable acrylic vials. The patented, epoxy locked vials are guaranteed for life and never need adjusting. The unique design easily fits into tool pouches or pockets, and is electro-static powder coated for an easy cleaning, long-lasting finish.
Evaluate.Reason: A level is a tool used in construction and home improvement.

Evaluate.Description: "Enjoy or give White Chocolate Amaretto-filled thin butter wafer cookies in the 12-oz canister--a great treat! Please note: there is an additional $15 shipping charge for shipping May 1 - October 31."

Korg created the micro metronome for musicians practicing in high volume situations. It eliminates straining to hear a traditional metronome, and the tangle of headphone cables. Lightweight and unobtrusive, the MM2 MetroGnome gently hooks over the ear, and its compact body rests against the earlobe. It has 39 selectable tempos (40-208 BPM), selectable time signatures, 8th and 16th notes, triplets, and a volume control. The MM-2 includes assorted color faceplates, and 2 ear clips for a comfortable fit. Powered by 3V Lithium battery.
Evaluate.Reason: A metronome is a tool used by musicians.
Carob chips are a food item.
